thread.title: Jo
thread.title_full: The Birth Poster betygsatt av Jo

author: Jo
title: Jo
text:
My favourite item in the house. The poster arrived in good time and excellent quality. I loved being able to personalise the poster and capture just how tiny my little Bub (already so much bigger) was
When framed the birth poster looks very nice and fits in with other artwork in my house whiteout looking tacky like some other ways to memorialise birth sizes.
It would be great to have a way to incorporate the birth weight into the 1:1 scale as well as the size.
My Bub was born 51 cm and on the 85th percentile for weight and my cousins Bub born 50cm and over a kilo lighter sitting on the third percentile, would look almost the same size using just length in the 1:1 scale
